Articles.Content:
Hello again i have installed mods on ksp steam but when my game lauch  ksp does not in full screen but on a smal screen and when  i put to full screen it's  cubic and very ugly so

How do I configure the laucher to my screen ?

It should be automatic.

Did you install mods in the Steam file, or did you copy the KSP stuff to a separate location and then add the mods?
